title: Pretty as a picture: the art of David Lynch
creator_credit: Toby Keeler and Fine Cut Presentations
brief_description: Using a behind the scenes look at the production of David Lynch’s ‘Lost highway’, this documentary looks at the auteur who brought us ‘Eraserhead’ (307091), ‘Elephant man’ (302534), ‘Blue velvet (302912), and the television series ‘Twin peaks’. He discusses his inspiration, impressions of his first film, and his drive for creative expression. Interviews are presented with actors who have starred in Lynchs’ films, relatives, and production crew. They include; Bill Pullman, Patricia Arquette, Mel Brooks, Jack Frisk, Barry Gifford, Jennifer Lynch, Jack Nance, Mary Sweeney and Dean Stockwell.
